transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .costSelector,.image-label,.total-cost,h2,h6{font-family:Philosopher,sans-serif}.buttontext,h3,h5,input,label,p,select{font-family:Barlow,sans-serif}::marker{color:#c64816}#room{background-image:none}#rates{background-position:right 0 center;padding-right:1rem}#adults,#children,#infants,#nationality,#rates,#rooms{background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' aria-hidden='true' viewBox='0 0 10 6'%3E%3Cpath stroke='%23FFF' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='m1 1 4 4 4-4'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")}.selected-room{align-items:center;border:1px solid #ddd;border-radius:4px;display:inline-flex;margin:5px;padding:5px}.close-icon{background:none;border:none;color:red;cursor:pointer;font-size:16px;margin-left:5px}table{border-collapse:collapse}tr{min-height:120px}td{vertical-align:top}
